siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

markdownRemark.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan has had another round of Wifi woes and continues to avoid moving to a mesh network. We talk about the iPhone 13 Pro Max and learn a little…
markdownRemark.html:
Dear Listener,

Stan has had another round of Wifi woes and continues to avoid moving to a mesh network. We talk about the iPhone 13 Pro Max and learn a little bit more about iOS 15.

Listen in and if you like what you hear please share with a friend.

Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier
